plot: A group of beavers goes about their dam-building, musically. The rain comes, and washes the dam away.
title: Los castores trabajadores
plot_es: A group of beavers goes about their dam-building, musically. The rain comes, and washes the dam away.
plot_en: A group of beavers goes about their dam-building, musically. The rain comes, and washes the dam away.
